name: Mizi No!
storyline:
We love cats! They are simply the best.
But let's be honest: These little rascals can also drive you crazy!

You are sitting relaxed on the couch and see from the corner of your eye that your cat jumps on the table, on which there is also a glass of water. They approach curiously and push the glass closer to the table's edge with their paw. No matter how often you say NO, they push it over the edge, making "clink"....

Mizi NO! is about putting together the shards the beloved cat left behind. Sort and rotate the shards and reassemble the whole in classic puzzle style.
summary: In this free 2D puzzle game, you must reassemble broken objects that your cat has knocked over.
